thread.title: Under Construction
thread.title_full: Under Construction - Review of Marriott Vacation Club Pulse, New York City, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Kirk H
title: Under Construction
text: The hotel is undergoing major reconstruction so there is noise, paint fumes, and rude workers controlling the elevators all day long. We had a newly renovated room with lights you can't control and furniture you will trip over. All this while paying top dollar prices for a broom closet experience. Avoid this place!!
